name: arrayShift
description: Removes the first element from an array and returns the removed element. This method changes the length of the array. If used on an empty array, an exception will be thrown.

params.name: array
params.description: An array of elements from which the first will be removed and returned.

lucee.notes: Lucee allows an additional parameter, `defaultValue` of type `any`, that is returned if the array is empty.

examples.title: Example with simple values
examples.description: Take an array of numbers and shift the first one off.

examples.title: Using a member function
examples.description: This is the same example as above, but using a member function on the array instead of a standalone function.
